GSD.product_version: versions from v4.2 to before v4.9.337
GSD.description:
scsi: snic: Fix possible UAF in snic_tgt_create()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.9.337 by commit f9d8b8ba0f1a16cde0b1fc9e80466df76b6db8ff, it was introduced in version v4.2 by commit c8806b6c9e824f47726f2a9b7fbbe7ebf19306fa. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: scsi: snic: Fix possible UAF in snic_tgt_create()
